location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

licenseType.Description: The type of the license resource.

licenseDetails.Description: Describes the properties of a License.

state.Description: Describes the state of the license.

edition.Description: Describes the edition of the license. The values are either Standard or Datacenter.

type.Description: Describes the license core type (pCore or vCore).

assignedLicenses.Description: Describes the number of assigned licenses.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

resources.Description: The list of extensions affiliated to the machine

kind.Description: Indicates which kind of Arc machine placement on-premises, such as HCI, SCVMM or VMware etc.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

locationData.Description: Metadata pertaining to the geographic location of the resource.

agentConfiguration.Description: Configurable properties that the user can set locally via the azcmagent config command, or remotely via ARM.

serviceStatuses.Description: Statuses of dependent services that are reported back to ARM.

cloudMetadata.Description: The metadata of the cloud environment (Azure/GCP/AWS/OCI...).

agentUpgrade.Description: The info of the machine w.r.t Agent Upgrade

osProfile.Description: Specifies the operating system settings for the hybrid machine.

licenseProfile.Description: Specifies the License related properties for a machine.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

status.Description: The status of the hybrid machine agent.

lastStatusChange.Description: The time of the last status change.

agentVersion.Description: The hybrid machine agent full version.

vmId.Description: Specifies the hybrid machine unique ID.

displayName.Description: Specifies the hybrid machine display name.

clientPublicKey.Description: Public Key that the client provides to be used during initial resource onboarding

osName.Description: The Operating System running on the hybrid machine.

osVersion.Description: The version of Operating System running on the hybrid machine.

vmUuid.Description: Specifies the Arc Machine's unique SMBIOS ID

osSku.Description: Specifies the Operating System product SKU.

osEdition.Description: The edition of the Operating System.

adFqdn.Description: Specifies the AD fully qualified display name.

dnsFqdn.Description: Specifies the DNS fully qualified display name.

privateLinkScopeResourceId.Description: The resource id of the private link scope this machine is assigned to, if any.

parentClusterResourceId.Description: The resource id of the parent cluster (Azure HCI) this machine is assigned to, if any.

mssqlDiscovered.Description: Specifies whether any MS SQL instance is discovered on the machine.

networkProfile.Description: Information about the network the machine is on.

name.Description: A canonical name for the geographic or physical location.

city.Description: The city or locality where the resource is located.

district.Description: The district, state, or province where the resource is located.

countryOrRegion.Description: The country or region where the resource is located

proxyUrl.Description: Specifies the URL of the proxy to be used.

incomingConnectionsPorts.Description: Specifies the list of ports that the agent will be able to listen on.

extensionsAllowList.Description: Array of extensions that are allowed to be installed or updated.

extensionsBlockList.Description: Array of extensions that are blocked (cannot be installed or updated)

proxyBypass.Description: List of service names which should not use the specified proxy server.

extensionsEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the extension service is enabled or disabled.

guestConfigurationEnabled.Description: Specified whether the guest configuration service is enabled or disabled.

configMode.Description: Name of configuration mode to use. Modes are pre-defined configurations of security controls, extension allowlists and guest configuration, maintained by Microsoft.

extensionService.Description: The state of the extension service on the Arc-enabled machine.

guestConfigurationService.Description: The state of the guest configuration service on the Arc-enabled machine.

status.Description: The current status of the service.

startupType.Description: The behavior of the service when the Arc-enabled machine starts up.

desiredVersion.Description: Specifies the version info w.r.t AgentUpgrade for the machine.

correlationId.Description: The correlation ID passed in from RSM per upgrade.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.Description: Specifies if RSM should try to upgrade this machine

lastAttemptDesiredVersion.Description: Specifies the version of the last attempt

lastAttemptStatus.Description: Specifies the status of Agent Upgrade.

lastAttemptMessage.Description: Failure message of last upgrade attempt if any.

computerName.Description: Specifies the host OS name of the hybrid machine.

windowsConfiguration.Description: Specifies the windows configuration for update management.

linuxConfiguration.Description: Specifies the linux configuration for update management.

licenseStatus.Description: Indicates the license status of the OS.

esuProfile.Description: Properties for the Machine ESU profile.

softwareAssuranceCustomer.Description: Specifies if this machine is licensed as part of a Software Assurance agreement.

licenseAssignmentState.Description: Describes the license assignment state (Assigned or NotAssigned).

serverType.Description: The type of the Esu servers.

esuEligibility.Description: Indicates the eligibility state of Esu.

esuKeyState.Description: Indicates whether there is an ESU Key currently active for the machine.

assignedLicenseImmutableId.Description: The guid id of the license.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

id.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.Description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

licenseStatus.Description: The current status of the license profile key.

subscriptionStatus.Description: Indicates the subscription status of the product.

productType.Description: Indicates the product type of the license.

billingStartDate.Description: The timestamp in UTC when the billing starts.

enrollmentDate.Description: The timestamp in UTC when the user enrolls the feature.

disenrollmentDate.Description: The timestamp in UTC when the user disenrolled the feature.

subscriptionStatus.Description: Indicates the current status of the product features.

billingStartDate.Description: The timestamp in UTC when the billing starts.

enrollmentDate.Description: The timestamp in UTC when the user enrolls the feature.

disenrollmentDate.Description: The timestamp in UTC when the user disenrolled the feature.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.Description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

displayStatus.Description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.Description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

ipAddresses.Description: The list of IP addresses in this interface.

subnet.Description: The subnet to which this IP address belongs.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

id.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.Description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

forceUpdateTag.Description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

publisher.Description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

type.Description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.Description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.Description: Indicates whether the extension should be automatically upgraded by the platform if there is a newer version available.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.Description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

settings.Description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

protectedSettings.Description: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of resource identity.

properties.Description: Describe the properties of a license profile.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

softwareAssuranceCustomer.Description: Specifies if this machine is licensed as part of a Software Assurance agreement.

assignedLicense.Description: The resource id of the license.

serverType.Description: The type of the Esu servers.

esuEligibility.Description: Indicates the eligibility state of Esu.

esuKeyState.Description: Indicates whether there is an ESU Key currently active for the machine.

assignedLicenseImmutableId.Description: The guid id of the license.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

source.Description: The source of the run command script.

parameters.Description: The parameters used by the script.

protectedParameters.Description: The parameters used by the script.

asyncExecution.Description: Optional. If set to true, provisioning will complete as soon as script starts and will not wait for script to complete.

runAsUser.Description: Specifies the user account on the machine when executing the run command.

runAsPassword.Description: Specifies the user account password on the machine when executing the run command.

timeoutInSeconds.Description: The timeout in seconds to execute the run command.

outputBlobUri.Description: Specifies the Azure storage blob where script output stream will be uploaded. Use a SAS URI with read, append, create, write access OR use managed identity to provide the VM access to the blob. Refer outputBlobManagedIdentity parameter.

errorBlobUri.Description: Specifies the Azure storage blob where script error stream will be uploaded. Use a SAS URI with read, append, create, write access OR use managed identity to provide the VM access to the blob. Refer errorBlobManagedIdentity parameter.

outputBlobManagedIdentity.Description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to outputBlobUri storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged

errorBlobManagedIdentity.Description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to errorBlobUri storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

instanceView.Description: The machine run command instance view.

script.Description: Specifies the script content to be executed on the machine.

scriptUri.Description: Specifies the script download location. It can be either SAS URI of an Azure storage blob with read access or public URI.

commandId.Description: Specifies the commandId of predefined built-in script.

scriptUriManagedIdentity.Description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to scriptUri in case of Azure storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure the Azure storage blob exists, and managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Reader' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged.

clientId.Description: Client Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ObjectId should not be used if this is provided.

objectId.Description: Object Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ClientId should not be used if this is provided.

executionMessage.Description: Communicate script configuration errors or execution messages.

exitCode.Description: Exit code returned from script execution.

displayStatus.Description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.Description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

properties.Description: Properties that define a Azure Arc PrivateLinkScope resource.

systemData.Description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Indicates whether machines associated with the private link scope can also use public Azure Arc service endpoints.

provisioningState.Description: Current state of this PrivateLinkScope: whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Provisioning ,Succeeded, Canceled and Failed.

privateLinkScopeId.Description: The Guid id of the private link scope.

privateEndpointConnections.Description: The collection of associated Private Endpoint Connections.

id.Description: The ARM Resource Id of the Private Endpoint.

name.Description: The Name of the Private Endpoint.

privateEndpoint.Description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.Description: Connection state of the private endpoint connection.

provisioningState.Description: State of the private endpoint connection.

id.Description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

status.Description: The private link service connection status.

description.Description: The private link service connection description.

actionsRequired.Description: The actions required for private link service connection.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.
Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

networkConfigurationScopeResourceId.Description: Associated Network Configuration Scope Resource Id

keyProperties.Description: Public key information for client authentication

properties.Description: The single extension based on search criteria

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

version.Description: The version of the Extension being received.

extensionType.Description: The type of the Extension being received.

publisher.Description: The publisher of the Extension being received.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

vmId.Description: The unique identifier for the resource.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

groupId.Description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.Description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.Description: Required DNS zone names of the the private link resource.

properties.Description: Properties that define a Network Security Perimeter resource.

provisioningState.Description: Current state of this NetworkSecurityPerimeter: whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Provisioning ,Succeeded, Canceled and Failed.

networkSecurityPerimeter.Description: The Network Security Perimeter associated with this configuration.

suggestedResourceIds.Description: ARM Ids of the resources that can be associated to the same perimeter to remediate the issue

suggestedAccessRules.Description: Access rules that can be added to the perimeter to remediate the issue

addressPrefixes.Description: Address prefixes that are allowed access.

perimeterGuid.Description: Guid of the Network Security Perimeter

accessRules.Description: Collection of access rules for the profile

enabledLogCategories.Description: Collection of enabled log categories for the profile
